name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_212Pb
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Pb" means the element "lead" and "212Pb" is the isotope "lead-212" with a half-life of 4.43e-01 days.
